title: Drawing, "Observatory, Caramoor, Ka", 1936
medium:
Watercolor, graphite, gouache, ruled borders in graphite and
Support: tracing paper laid down
inscribed: Inscribed in gold gouache, upper left: OBSERVATORY/CARAMOOR/KATONAH N.Y.; in graphite at lower right: C.F. Rosborg. Architect/ No. 369. Lexington. Ave. N.Y.C.:/Powell and Playford. Decorators/No 220 East. 80th St. N.Y.C.; in graphite at lower left: July 1st, 1936
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Christian Francis Rosborg
description: Scale: noted in graphite at lower left
